   20: 
   21: -module(ct_update_config_SUITE2).
   22: 
   23: -suite_defaults([{timetrap, {minutes, 10}}]).
   24: 
   25: %% Note: This directive should only be used in test suites.
   26: -compile([export_all, nowarn_export_all]).
   27: -include("ct.hrl").
   28: 
   29: -define(now, ct_test_support:unique_timestamp()).
   30: 
   31: %% Test server callback functions
   32: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   33:     [{init_per_suite,?now}|Config].
   34: 
   35: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   36:     ok.
   37: 
   38: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   39:     [{init_per_group,?now}|Config].
   40: 
   41: end_per_group(_GroupName, _Config) ->
   42:     ok.
   43: 
   44: all() ->
   45:     [{group,group1}].
   46: 
   47: groups() ->
   48:     [{group1,[],[test_case,
   49:                  test_case_fail,
   50:                  test_case_timetrap]}].
   51: 
   52: test_case(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   53:     ok.
   54: 
   55: test_case_fail(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   56:     ct:fail(because_i_want_failure).
   57: 
   58: test_case_timetrap() ->
   59:     [{timetrap, {seconds, 1}}].
   60: 
   61: test_case_timetrap(_) ->
   62:     ct:sleep(infinity).
